title: **OCEANFRONT* Capitola Condo Unbeatable location
posting_body: The most sought after location in all of Santa Cruz, situated on the point of Depot Hill.

Depot Hill and Opal Cliffs surround Capitola Village and are considered the most desired coast properties in county because they combined unmatched views while maintaining a high level of privacy and easy beach access.
This space is a unique gem as it is just a quick walk down the steps to Capitola village but above the hustle and bustle of the activity to give privacy and views that will not disappoint.
This unit features a private deck to watch world renown sunsets over opal cliffs.
This is a two storyunit with the bedroom and bathroom upstairs, and bedroom upstairs.
